alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pulaski County through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pulaski, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Radford... Pulaski... Dublin... Claytor Dam... Claytor Lake State Park... Draper... and Graysontown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
